languages.text: {n}Демон вновь хрипло смеется.{/n} "Истинное, жаждущее бесконечной власти Дитя Рассвета. Попробуй одолеть меня, и явь рассудит, падешь ты от руки несущего волю Ткача Судеб или сделаешь его своим слугой".

{n}The daemon laughs raspily again.{/n} "A true Child of the Dawn who hungers for infinite power. Contend with me, and the outcome will decide whether you are to fall to that which carries the will of the Weaver of Destinies — or make it your servant."
languages.original_text: {n}Демон вновь хрипло смеется.{/n} "Истинное, жаждущее бесконечной власти Дитя Рассвета. Попробуй одолеть меня, и явь рассудит, падешь ты от руки несущего волю Ткача Судеб или сделаешь его своим слугой".

traits.locale_text: {n}The daemon laughs raspily again.{/n} "A true Child of the Dawn who hungers for infinite power. Try to contend with me, and the outcome will decide whether you are to fall to that which carries the will of the Weaver of Destinies — or make it your servant."

{n}The daemon laughs raspily again.{/n} "A true Child of the Dawn who hungers for infinite power. Try to contend with me, and the outcome will decide whether you are to fall to that which carries the will of the Weaver of Destinies — or make it your servant."

{n}The daemon laughs raspily again.{/n} "A true Child of the Dawn who hungers for infinite power. Contend with me, and the outcome will decide whether you are to fall to that which carries the will of the Weaver of Destinies — or make it your servant."

{n}The daemon laughs raspily again.{/n} "A true Child of the Dawn who hungers for infinite power. Contend with me, and the outcome will decide whether you are to fall to that which carries the will of the Weaver of Destinies — or make it your servant."

{n}The daemon laughs raspily again.{/n} "A true Child of the Dawn who hungers for infinite power. Contend with me, and the outcome will decide whether you are to fall to that which carries the will of the Weaver of Destinies — or make it your servant."

{n}The daemon laughs raspily again.{/n} "A true Child of the Dawn who hungers for infinite power. Contend with me, and the outcome will decide whether you are to fall to that which carries the will of the Weaver of Destinies — or make it your servant."

languages.text: {n}Der Dämon lacht erneut heiser.{/n} "Ein wahres Kind der Dämmerung, das nach unendlicher Macht hungert. Konkurriert mit mir, und das Ergebnis wird zeigen, ob Ihr dem unterliegt, was den Willen des Webers der Schicksale in sich trägt – oder es zu Eurem Diener macht."
languages.original_text: {n}The daemon laughs raspily again.{/n} "A true Child of the Dawn who hungers for infinite power. Contend with me, and the outcome will decide whether you are to fall to that which carries the will of the Weaver of Destinies — or make it your servant."

traits.locale_text: {n}Der Dämon lacht erneut heiser.{/n} "Ein wahres Kind der Dämmerung, das nach unendlicher Macht hungert. Konkurriert mit mir, und das Ergebnis wird zeigen, ob Ihr dem unterliegt, was den Willen des Webers der Schicksale in sich trägt – oder es zu Eurem Diener macht."

languages.text: {n}Le démon éclate à nouveau d'un rire rauque.{/n} « {mf|Un|Une} véritable enfant de l'Aube qui a soif d'un pouvoir infini. Très bien, tâchez de vous montrer à la hauteur et nous verrons si vous tomberez devant celui qui représente la volonté du Tisseur de Destins ou ferez de lui votre serviteur. »
languages.original_text: {n}The daemon laughs raspily again.{/n} "A true Child of the Dawn who hungers for infinite power. Contend with me, and the outcome will decide whether you are to fall to that which carries the will of the Weaver of Destinies — or make it your servant."

traits.locale_text: {n}Le démon éclate à nouveau d'un rire rauque.{/n} « {mf|Un|Une} véritable enfant de l'Aube qui a soif d'un pouvoir infini. Très bien, tâchez de vous montrer à la hauteur et nous verrons si vous tomberez devant celui qui représente la volonté du Tisseur de Destins ou ferez de lui votre serviteur. »

languages.text: {n}恶魔再次发出了刺耳的大笑声。{/n}“你是真正的黎明之子，渴求无穷无尽的力量。与我一战吧，让我看看，你是会成为命运编织者行使意志的工具，还是会让这强大的力量臣服于你。”
languages.original_text: {n}The daemon laughs raspily again.{/n} "A true Child of the Dawn who hungers for infinite power. Contend with me, and the outcome will decide whether you are to fall to that which carries the will of the Weaver of Destinies — or make it your servant."

traits.locale_text: {n}恶魔再次发出了刺耳的大笑声。{/n}“你是真正的黎明之子，渴求无穷无尽的力量。与我一战吧，让我看看，你是会成为命运编织者行使意志的工具，还是会让这强大的力量臣服于你。”

languages.text: {n}El daemon vuelve a emitir una risa ronca.{/n} «Un{mf||a} verdader{mf|o|a} Vástago del Amanecer, que ansía poder infinito. Enfréntate a mí, y que el resultado decida si caerás ante lo que posee la voluntad del Tejedor de Destinos... o si lo convertirás en tu sirviente».
languages.original_text: {n}The daemon laughs raspily again.{/n} "A true Child of the Dawn who hungers for infinite power. Contend with me, and the outcome will decide whether you are to fall to that which carries the will of the Weaver of Destinies — or make it your servant."

traits.locale_text: {n}El daemon vuelve a emitir una risa ronca.{/n} «Un{mf||a} verdader{mf|o|a} Vástago del Amanecer, que ansía poder infinito. Enfréntate a mí, y que el resultado decida si caerás ante lo que posee la voluntad del Tejedor de Destinos... o si lo convertirás en tu sirviente».

languages.text: {n}ディーモンは再びしゃがれた声で笑った。{/n}「真の暁の子よ…無限の力に飢えているというわけか。私に立ち向かうがよい。その結果により、お前が『運命の操り手』の意思に屈して堕ちるか…それともそれがお前の従者になるかが定まるだろう」
languages.original_text: {n}The daemon laughs raspily again.{/n} "A true Child of the Dawn who hungers for infinite power. Contend with me, and the outcome will decide whether you are to fall to that which carries the will of the Weaver of Destinies — or make it your servant."

traits.locale_text: {n}ディーモンは再びしゃがれた声で笑った。{/n}「真の暁の子よ…無限の力に飢えているというわけか。私に立ち向かうがよい。その結果により、お前が『運命の操り手』の意思に屈して堕ちるか…それともそれがお前の従者になるかが定まるだろう」

languages.text: {n}İblis, boğuk bir kahkaha daha savuruyor.{/n} "İşte sonsuz kudrete aç hakiki bir Şafak Evladı... Gel, benimle boy ölçüş. Sonunda ya Kader Dokuyan'ın iradesini taşıyan kudrete yenik düşecek yahut onu kendine hizmetkâr edeceksin."
languages.original_text: {n}The daemon laughs raspily again.{/n} "A true Child of the Dawn who hungers for infinite power. Contend with me, and the outcome will decide whether you are to fall to that which carries the will of the Weaver of Destinies — or make it your servant."

traits.locale_text: {n}İblis, boğuk bir kahkaha daha savurur.{/n} "İşte sonsuz kudrete aç hakiki bir Şafak Evladı... Gel, benimle boy ölçüş. Sonunda ya Kader Dokuyan'ın iradesini taşıyan kudrete yenik düşecek yahut onu kendine hizmetkâr edeceksin."
